item.description:
Wine and Canoe Trip

http://www.huckfinnadventures.com/specialtrips.php

Start by going in a 2 person canoe.

10 people or more will be only $22.50 - Please find a partner once
everyone signs up. If there is one person left -
One canoe can hold 3 smaller girls...(500 weight limit)

*CASH OR CHECK ONLY* - No credit cards

Price includes paddles, PFDs, shuttle back, and tax:
Group (5+ canoes).......................$45/ea.
Solo canoe..............................$35/ea.

And then we have the wine tastings for $9.

http://www.rosedale1920.com/events.html

Wine Tastings
Every Saturday and Sunday from 12-5pm $9 per person. Enjoy a sampling of our vintages and you get to keep your own glass.  

SO YOU GUYS ARE LOOKING AT $22.50 + $9 = $31.50 max
and then more if you would like to purchase a bottle of wine.

We will bring our own food also.. so please ring a small
picnic basket with cheeses, fruits, veggies, desserts, etc ..please
post what you want to bring so we don't all bring the same
type of cheese. 

What to wear - Shorts, shoes, whatever you wish.....
The guide at Huck Finns says you won't be getting wet so
no need to worry about water shoes. Bring a towel to put down to sit, the canoes can be a little dirty...

Once we get to Rosedale farms and go through our tastings
and hang out a bit. They will provide the shuttle to take
us back to our cars.

Directions: 

Our launch is located 8 miles west of Hartford, off
Route 10 near the intersection of Route 10 and 44.

The local address is:
21 Waterville Road
Avon, CT 06001

Turn as if you are turning into Nassau's furniture
(they have the biggest sign near the road). 
Straight ahead you will see a gravel road - take it
down to the river, where we'll be waiting
item.name: Wine and Canoe Trip
